4. Amanda Abraham

Amanda Abraham
==============

![Mayor Pro Tem 1](https://www.marshalltexas.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1526 "Mayor Pro Tem 1")

Amanda Abraham, District 6
--------------------------

**Term**: 2022 to 2026  
[Email Amanda Abraham](mailto:abraham.amanda@marshalltexas.net)

### Biography

Amanda Abraham currently serves as Mayor Pro-Tem, she is a native of Marshall and graduated from Marshall High School in 1998. She graduated from Texas A&M University in 2002 with a Bachelor of Science degree in Journalism with an emphasis in Public Relations and a minor in Business Administration.  In 2006, Ms. Abraham earned her Doctor of Jurisprudence degree from South Texas College of Law.

### Employment

Council Member Abraham is a partner at Roth & Abraham Law Firm where she has practiced law since 2006.

### Community Service

* Citizens Advisory Council, Member
* Dayspring Therapeutic Equestrian Center, Board Member
